description: A patterned SST anomaly is applied on top of the monthly-varying amip SSTs. This anomaly is a monthly climatology, taken from each model's own abrupt 4xCO2 run minus piControl (using the mean of years 111-140 of abrupt4xCO2, and the parallel 30 year section of piControl).
name: amip SST plus patterned anomaly derived from 4xCO2 - piControl SST change
longName: amip sea surface temperature plus patterned SST anomaly derived from 4xCO2 - piControl SST change
keywords: patterned SST warming, amip,  4xCO2-piControl, seasonally varying monthly means.
